title: Lies My Pastor Told Me - Cole Brown - Audiobook [humblebeast]
description:
"This book is not anti-pastor. I myself am a pastor and firmly hold to the Biblical teaching that all Christians are to actively participate in the local church and to honor and submit to the spiritual authorities God has placed over them (Hebrews 13:17). Yet all spiritual authorities, including myself, are only as authoritative as they are faithful to the supreme authority of Jesus and his gospel (1 Corinthians 11:1, 1 Timothy 5:20).
